parameters.name: VTlbRef
parameters.description: Array of strings of the user-specified type library references

title: ISldWorks.RemoveUserTypeLibReferences
description: Removes the user-specified type library references.

parameters.name: VTlbRef
parameters.description: Array of strings of the user-specified type library references

returns: True if the user-specified type library references are removed, false if not
remarks:
Any macro recorded after this method is called will not have references to the removed user-specified type libraries.
An add-in can use this method to
remove its type library references when the add-in is unloaded.
See
Type Libraries
for details.
